scripts.test1: cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --verbose --runInBand -t "notes are returned as json"
scripts.test2: cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --verbose --runInBand -t "all notes are returned"
scripts.test3: cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --verbose --runInBand -t "a specific note is within the returned notes"
scripts.test4: cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --verbose --runInBand -t "a valid note can be added"
scripts.test5: cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --verbose --runInBand -t "note without content is not added"
scripts.test6: cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --verbose --runInBand -t "a specific note can be viewed"
scripts.test7: cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --verbose --runInBand -t "a note can be deleted"
